Title: Staff Data Scientist - (Quick Commerce)
Description:
As the world‚Äôs pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe‚Äôs largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

Job Description

We are on the lookout for a Staff Data Scientist to join our Quick Commerce Commercial Tribe. In this role you will be exposed to various topics related to our Quick Commerce business ‚Äì assortment optimisation, content generation, promotion effectiveness improvement, and ranking. You will help other Data Scientists to deliver high quality solutions, challenge our assumptions and improve DS practices across our teams.

As a Staff Data Scientist, you will work closely with multiple cross-functional teams (Data Scientists, Machine Learning Engineers, and Software Engineers) to build and maintain highly scalable and reliable ML services deployed in dozens of countries globally with millions of customers.

If you're a skilled Data Scientist and creative problem solver who is eager to deliver solutions and hungry for a new adventure, an international workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin!


Guide the discovery of new innovative data products from conception to operationalization to help optimize our systems and improve the experience for our users.
Keep yourself up to date and suggest state-of-the-art models to find out what works best for our customers.
Be the main reference point for new research and tech quality of Data Science in Qcommerce Commercial & Media Solutions tribes.
Enable collaboration and knowledge sharing by pushing cross teams‚Äô projects.
Set up our teams for success by creating a long-term vision, a mid-term strategy, and several short-term roadmaps toward some of the most complex and interesting data problems.
Last but not least, you are not afraid to build global systems that are used by thousands of people and constantly strive for excellence.


Qualifications


Strong Statistical & ML Foundation ‚Äì Comfortable with fundamentals, first-principles thinking, and ML theory across various domains.
Software Engineering Best Practices ‚Äì Write maintainable Python code, ensuring high standards in production systems (observability, monitoring, performance).
Domain Expertise ‚Äì Deep knowledge in at least one relevant area, such as causal inference, time series, Bayesian methods, NLP/LLM, ranking/matching, or advanced experimentation.
Data-Driven Approach ‚Äì Carefully question assumptions before working on use cases and prioritize clean, reliable data.
Effective Communication & Agile Mindset ‚Äì Filter and prioritize stakeholder requirements, focusing on MVPs and agile development.
Mentorship & Collaboration ‚Äì Support team growth through mentoring while emphasizing reliability, disciplined experimentation, and data-focused development.


Nice to Have:


Leadership & Operational Excellence ‚Äì Proven leadership in driving operational excellence and best practices within engineering teams.
System Design & Scalability ‚Äì Experience designing and implementing large, scalable distributed systems using microservices and heterogeneous platform components, with knowledge of GCP.
Expertise in Testing & Knowledge Sharing ‚Äì Strong background in A/B testing to analyze model effectiveness, with a record of knowledge sharing through conferences or publications.


Additional Information

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you‚Äôre in good shape, then we‚Äôre in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 ‚Ç¨ Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we‚Äôll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts and Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you‚Äôre excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world‚Äôs leading delivery platform, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience‚Äîjust include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: Trainee Data Analytics (w/m/d)
Description:
F√ºr unseren Gesch√§ftsbereich Transformation suchen wir dich zum n√§chstm√∂glichen Zeitpunkt als¬†Trainee Data Analytics (w/m/d).
¬†

Das erwartet dich

Individualit√§t¬†‚Äì Mit einem f√ºr dich ma√ügeschneiderten sechsmonatigen Ausbildungsplan wirst du optimal auf das Berufsfeld des Business-Analytics-Beraters im SAP-Umfeld vorbereitet. Teil des Traineeprogramms werden z.B. fachliche und technologische Trainings, Schulungen und Arbeitsmethoden sein, welche mit einer SAP-Zertifizierung abschlie√üen.

Analytics ‚Äì¬†Du leitest aus den Gesch√§ftsprozessen die Anforderungen an die Business-Analytics-L√∂sungen ab und entwickelst ganzheitliche Anwendungen. Unsere Beratungsteams begleiten in allen Phasen der Projektrealisierung: Von der Anforderungs- und Bedarfsanalyse √ºber die Erstellung betriebswirtschaftlicher Konzepte, bis zur Realisierung und Implementierung.

Beratungsfunktion¬†‚Äì Wir beraten unsere Kunden in den Themen rund um SAP Business and Analytics, SAP Business Intelligence, SAP S/4HANA (Embedded Analytics) und SAP HANA Cloud.

Datenanalyse ‚Äì¬†Mit Werkzeugen aus den Bereichen Big Data, Predictive Analytics, Business AI, Cloud Computing, Business Analytics und Business Intelligence deckst du das gesamte Spektrum der Datenanalyse ab.

¬†

Das bringst du mit

¬†

Dein Studium der (Wirtschafts-) Informatik, der Wirtschaftswissenschaften, des Ingenieurwesens, der Mathematik, der Statistik oder eines verwandten Fachbereichs hast du erfolgreich abgeschlossen oder stehst kurz davor.

Du bist begeistert davon, dich mit den Feldern Business and Analytics und Business AI auseinanderzusetzen und in diesem Umfeld L√∂sungen mit unseren Kunden zu entwickeln.

Idealerweise kannst du erste Erfahrungen in Form von Praktika oder Werkstundentent√§tigkeiten im Bereich Business and Analytics oder Business AI vorweisen.

Sehr gute Deutsch- und gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift bringst du mit.

Das Traineeprogramm startet zum¬†01.10.2025.

¬†

Deine Benefits

Flexibilit√§t ‚Äì Deine Arbeitszeit und deinen Arbeitsort kannst du bei uns - in Abstimmung mit den betrieblichen Anforderungen und arbeitsrechtlichen Bestimmungen - selber bestimmen. Dabei gibt es keine Kernarbeitszeiten und du hast die M√∂glichkeit, im Home Office sowie in √ºber 40 L√§ndern zu arbeiten.

Masterf√∂rderung ‚Äì Durch unsere interne Academy, internationale Erfahrungen durch Secondments und kontinuierliches Mentoring entwickelst du dich stetig weiter. Dar√ºber hinaus bieten wir die M√∂glichkeit einer Masterf√∂rderung f√ºr Examensmaster und Spezialisierungsmaster an.

Freizeit ‚Äì Dank eines Teilzeit-Blockmodells kannst du auch mehrmonatige Auszeiten in Form eines Sabbaticals nehmen. Zus√§tzlich kannst du bei PwC Deutschland √úberstunden auf einem pers√∂nlichen Jahresarbeitszeitskonto sammeln. Deine √úberstunden kannst du im Laufe des Jahres durch Freizeit ausgleichen. Restliche √úberstunden werden einmal j√§hrlich ausgezahlt.

Gesundheit ‚Äì Deine Gesundheit liegt uns am Herzen: Neben einer eigenen betrieblichen Krankenkasse bieten wir auch Vorsorgeuntersuchungen sowie Sportangebote an. Nimm an unserem kostenlosen Betriebssportprogramm teil oder profitiere von verg√ºnstigten Beitr√§gen in diversen Fitnessstudios oder einer Urban Sports Club-Mitgliedschaft.

Das ist noch nicht alles ‚Äì Wir m√∂chten ein positives Arbeitsumfeld schaffen: Ein Umfeld, in dem flexibles und kreatives Arbeiten m√∂glich ist, in dem Arbeit anerkannt und Leistung honoriert wird und auf das wir stolz sind. Alle Benefits findest du auf unserer Karriereseite.

¬†

¬†

Bei PwC Deutschland arbeiten wir daran, entscheidende Herausforderungen zu l√∂sen, nachhaltige Ergebnisse zu schaffen und das Vertrauen in die Wirtschaft und Gesellschaft auszubauen. Als Teil unseres Finance Transformation Teams unterst√ºtzt du Unternehmen dabei, ihre Finanzabteilung zu einem noch st√§rkeren Businesspartner zu machen und so die Wettbewerbsf√§higkeit des gesamten Unternehmens schneller voranzutreiben. Dabei ist unser Themenspektrum breit: Von CFO-Strategie √ºber Process Excellence, ERP-Systemen, Quality Assurance, Compliance und Data Management. Dabei stellen wir als integriertes Finance Transformation-Team das reibungslose Ineinandergreifen aller Teilprojekte entlang der gesamten Wertsch√∂pfungskette sicher.

¬†

Kontakt

Du hast Fragen zu dieser Position oder deiner Bewerbung?

Melde dich gerne bei Theresa Volders unter +49 1515 4092298.

Title: Senior Data Analyst, Supply Analytics
Description:
Change the way the world travels

Be part of the GetYourGuide journey and connect people with unforgettable travel experiences worldwide. Since 2009, millions of travelers have booked unique activities with us in over 12,000 cities. Our headquarters in Berlin is supported by 16 other local offices across the globe.

Ready to join a diverse community of over 850 fellow explorers dedicated to revolutionizing the travel experience industry? Check out our careers site to learn more.

Team mission

The Analytics team's mission is to enable the organisation to take action based on data. We work on a variety of problems and datasets as members of cross-functional mission teams. We take ownership of the entire analytics funnel, from exploration through recommendations to impact measurement, and take pride in the insights we generate.

Your mission


Develop quantitative analysis to initiate and drive business decisions focusing on supply strategy
Help the supply business and tech teams learn about their features by designing and analyzing Experiments.
Design and implement metrics, dashboards, and reports to guide the teams‚Äô strategy and success.
Support the technical teams in tracking and producing more insightful data.
Contribute to the learning and experimentation culture of the company by promoting hypothesis-driven product and operational development and evaluation.
Mentor others in the skills needed for this role


Your toolkit


6+ years of relevant experience interpreting data in an analytics, data science or business intelligence role
Ability to collaborate with multiple teams to drive strategic decisions and execute on them
Strong project management skills
Strong knowledge of SQL and knowledge of Python
Experience with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g. Looker, Jupyter Notebooks)
Curiosity and reasoning skills with proven evidence of problem-solving.
Ability to understand user behavior and meaning behind the numbers
Desire to work in an international environment, with minimal direction and with highly engaged individuals
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English


What Sets You Apart


Previous experience working with agile product teams is a plus.
Experienced with the statistics and assumptions of experimentation.
Familiarity with ETL technologies like Airflow is a plus.
Experience with big data tools (e.g. Spark, Hive) is a plus


We want your journey with us to be extraordinary

Here‚Äôs how you can expect us to commit to you and your growth.


Annual personal growth budget and mentorship programs for continuous learning and development
Work from anywhere in the world for 40 days per year
Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
Opportunities to collaborate and socialize with team members through quarterly team events and yearly company-wide events
Monthly transportation and fitness budget
Discounts for you, your friends, and family on GetYourGuide activities
Language reimbursement program
Health and wellness benefits


And more‚Ä¶

How To Apply

Submit your CV/resume in English using the form below. For tips and insights into our hiring process and culture, check out ‚Äòhow we hire‚Äô and ‚Äòlife at GetYourGuide‚Äô. If you have any further questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to get in touch at jobs@getyourguide.com.

We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to their skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with your application.

  • Experience with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g. Looker, Jupyter Notebooks)
  • Curiosity and reasoning skills with proven evidence of problem-solving.
  • Ability to understand user behavior and meaning behind the numbers
  • Desire to work in an international environment, with minimal direction and with highly engaged individuals
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English

What Sets You Apart

  • Previous experience working with agile product teams is a plus.
  • Experienced with the statistics and assumptions of experimentation.
  • Familiarity with ETL technologies like Airflow is a plus.
  • Experience with big data tools (e.g. Spark, Hive) is a plus

We want your journey with us to be extraordinary

Here‚Äôs how you can expect us to commit to you and your growth.

  • Annual personal growth budget and mentorship programs for continuous learning and development
  • Work from anywhere in the world for 40 days per year
  • Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
  • Opportunities to collaborate and socialize with team members through quarterly team events and yearly company-wide events
  • Monthly transportation and fitness budget
  • Discounts for you, your friends, and family on GetYourGuide activities
  • Language reimbursement program
  • Health and wellness benefits

And more‚Ä¶

How To Apply

Submit your CV/resume in English using the form below. For tips and insights into our hiring process and culture, check out ‚Äòhow we hire‚Äô and ‚Äòlife at GetYourGuide‚Äô. If you have any further questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to get in touch at jobs@getyourguide.com.

We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to their skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with your application.

Title: Product Analyst - (Logistics Customer, Seamless)
Description:
As the world‚Äôs pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe‚Äôs largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

Job Description

We are on the lookout for an experienced Product Analyst to join the Customer Product Line, Logistics Analytics Team, on our journey to always deliver amazing experiences.

In Logistics, we build products and shape processes towards an amazing delivery experience for our customers, riders, and service. The role is for Seamless domain in the Customer Product Line. In the Seamless Analytics team, we curate data to uncover insights, work closely with the product, enable self-service discovery, and drive the strategic development of Logistics functions. Being embedded in the Product Line, we foster the ‚Äúdata-first‚Äù mindset and drive change in product development.

As a Product Analyst, you will bring insights for one or more domains, collaborate with a team of about 5-7 analysts, drive projects across various data functions, collaborate with Data Science and Backend Engineers and enable our stakeholders in Product, Tech, and Operations to make data-driven decisions.


Engaging with key stakeholders to understand the business vision, requirements & priorities and helping to translate this into actionable insights
Build accessible, creative and engaging data visualizations to facilitate access to insights
Develop and curate unstructured data in collaboration with Data Engineering, Product and Operations
Refine, challenge and support requests from stakeholders and generate new data analyses
Lead data exploration projects, and help identify and define future insight and data needs to support various business initiatives
Own our data catalog for all Logistics dimensions, metrics and KPIs
Be an active player in working with and understanding the product end to end, its features and gaps and provide useful and necessary insights to the team to improve the product always
Ensuring proper AB testing for the features that we launch, sharing insights from the significance tests


In our Logistics Team, you‚Äôll tackle high-impact challenges that make last-mile delivery efficient, affordable, and sustainable. Your work will directly improve experiences for riders, end customers, and merchants across the globe. Each enhancement you contribute will help Delivery Hero optimize delivery operations, supporting expansion into new areas like grocery and retail.

Qualifications


2-4 years experience as a BI/Data/Product analyst working for internet companies
Bachelor's degree or higher in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, physics, mathematics, engineering, statistics)
Excellent SQL skills, with practical experience of big data tools (ideally BigQuery)
Intermediate Python skills, with practical experience
You are creative in data visualization (Tableau experience is a plus)
Experience with version control systems (VCS) (e.g. Github)
Proven team player behavior and process-oriented mindset
Independent and rigorous working style, appreciation for Agile environments
Good English communication skills
Experience in dealing with stakeholders and challenging the scope of projects
Proven record of adopting and improving team standards and processes
Highly passionate about data, with creative problem-solving abilities and an eye for detail
Nice to have: Experience with orchestration tools such as airflow, DBT, metaflow


Additional Information

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you‚Äôre in good shape, then we‚Äôre in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we‚Äôll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
Look up and go for it. We will support you in developing yourself and your career: 1.000 ‚Ç¨ Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.


Ready to join our team? If you‚Äôre excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world‚Äôs leading delivery platform, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience‚Äîjust include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: Data Analyst / Experience Analytics - Digital Workplace (w/m/d)
Description:
Du hast eine Leidenschaft f√ºr neue Technologien und m√∂chtest zu einer nachhaltigen, gr√ºneren Zukunft beitragen?

Das Experience Command Center (ECC) ist eine zentrale Einheit innerhalb der Domain Global Technology Platforms / Digital Workplace. Unsere Mission ist es, durch Problem- und Eskalationsmanagement sowie Data Insights den Produktteams ein effizientes Arbeiten zu erm√∂glichen. Wir zeigen Verbesserungspotentiale innerhalb der Produkte auf, sodass Innovationen schneller umgesetzt werden k√∂nnen und stellen sicher, dass unsere Nutzer die bestm√∂gliche IT-Erfahrung erhalten.

Deine Rolle ‚Äì sinnhaft & wertvoll


Du erstellst datenbasierte Trends und Reports zur Unterst√ºtzung und Verbesserung unserer Digital Workplace Produkte
Zu deinen Aufgaben geh√∂rt ebenfalls die Administration und Optimierung von Client-Systemen mithilfe von Skriptsprachen wie PowerShell, Batch und SQL
Mit Hilfe von APIs verkn√ºpfst du Device-Managementsysteme und sorgst f√ºr eine reibungslose Integration und Datenaustausch
Du dokumentierst komplexe technische Vorg√§nge und Probleme
Komplexe Daten, Business-Themen und deren Zusammenh√§nge analysierst, verstehst und visualisierst du f√ºr fundierte Entscheidungen
Du arbeitest eng mit Dienstleistern zusammen, formulierst Anforderungen und l√∂st Herausforderungen
Gemeinsam mit Product Ownern und Experten aus verschiedenen Fachbereichen bist du Teil eines internationalen, cross-funktionalen Teams



Dein Profil ‚Äìauthentisch & neugierig


Eine IT-Berufsausbildung oder ein Bachelorstudium in einem technischen Bereich (z. B. Fachinformatik, Daten-/Prozessanalyse, Data Science) bildet die Grundlage f√ºr diese Position
Vorzugsweise hast du bereits Berufserfahrung im IT-Support gesammelt, wodurch du ein fundiertes Verst√§ndnis √ºber die Funktionsweise von Clients, Software und deren Administration im Unternehmenskontext mitbringst
Gute analytische F√§higkeiten sowie Berufserfahrung in der Analyse von Daten im Bereich End User Computing sind vorhanden
Idealerweise besteht bereits Erfahrung mit Softwareprogrammen wie Nexthink, Microsoft PowerBI & PowerShell, Azure Data Lake, Snowflake und ServiceNow
Vorkenntnisse im Coaching oder in der Wissensvermittlung sind von Vorteil
Hervorragende Kommunikations- und Dokumentationsf√§higkeiten unterst√ºtzen die Zusammenarbeit
Eine gro√üe Leidenschaft f√ºr Technik sowie der Wunsch, Probleme nachhaltig zu l√∂sen, sind essenziell
Sehr gute Kommunikationsf√§higkeiten in Deutsch und Englisch runden das Profil ab



Unsere Benefits ‚Äì vielseitig & durchdacht


Freue Dich auf Flexibilit√§t: Bei uns kannst du B√ºroarbeit und Homeoffice flexibel miteinander kombinieren. Du kannst sogar 20 Tage pro Jahr innerhalb Europas im Workation-Modus arbeiten.
Entfalte Deine Talente: Wir m√∂chten, dass du mit uns w√§chst. Ob bei der t√§glichen Arbeit, im aktiven Austausch mit anderen oder einem individuellen Training - unsere Lernkultur erm√∂glicht es Dir, Deine pers√∂nliche Entwicklung auf das n√§chste Level zu bringen.
Vernetze Dich: Nutze die Gelegenheit, Dich in unseren Digital Empowerment Communities f√ºr Zusammenarbeit, Lernen und Netzwerkbildung zu engagieren.
Tanke neue Energie: Bei uns hast Du 30 Tage Urlaub pro Jahr plus Heiligabend und Silvester frei. Du willst mehr? Dann tausche einen Teil Deines Gehaltes gegen zus√§tzliche Urlaubstage oder mache ein Sabbatical.
Profitiere von unseren Mobilit√§tsl√∂sungen: Von Auto- und Fahrrad-Leasingangeboten bis hin zu einem subventionierten Deutschland-Ticket ‚Äì Dein Weg ist unser Weg.
Denke voraus: Mit unserer betrieblichen Altersvorsorge und einem guten Versicherungspaket k√ºmmern wir uns um Deine Zukunft.
Das ist noch lange nicht alles‚Ä¶ √úber alle weiteren Benefits sprechen wir gerne mit Dir im Recruitingprozess.



Hast Du noch Fragen?

Bitte habe Verst√§ndnis daf√ºr, dass wir aus datenschutzrechtlichen Gr√ºnden ausschlie√ülich √ºber unser Portal eingereichte Bewerbungen annehmen k√∂nnen. Bewerbungsunterlagen, die uns per E-Mail erreichen, k√∂nnen wir leider nicht ber√ºcksichtigen.

Title: Product Analyst
Description:
TripleTen is a service that empowers individuals, regardless of their prior experience, to embark on the exciting and challenging journey of mastering tech professions such as software engineering, data science, business intelligence analytics, and QA in a feasible and accessible way, ultimately leading to employment opportunities.*

Our mission is to ensure that every student has the opportunity to successfully master a new profession and become a valuable member of the tech industry. We are successfully producing highly desirable tech professionals in the most competitive EdTech market in the world - the US market.

What you will do:


Conduct exploratory analyses to uncover actionable product insights and opportunities from our existing data
Independently lead full-cycle analytical projects ‚Äî from scoping problems from stakeholders requirements to initiating data collection (if needed) with data engineers and developers, and delivering actionable outcomes:
Tableau dashboards
In-depth product research reports
Evaluation of changes from the experiment (without A/B testing)
Foster a data-driven culture by training and advising product teams on data-informed decisions, experiments set up, designing metrics (product, learning, KPIs)


Requirements:


3+ years experience in the role of data/product analyst.
Ability to choose an appropriate statistical test and conduct statistical research
Experience independently analyzing data and generating hypotheses/insights using industry-standard analytics tools (i.e. SQL, Python)
Strong data communication and interpretation skills including designing dashboards (i.e. Tableau) and presenting complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
Upper-intermediate (B2+) English level.


Preferred qualifications:


Experience doing analytics on educational products
Experience with PySpark and/or Tableau


What we can offer you:


Fully remote and full-time collaboration with professional freedom and minimal micromanagement;
Dynamic Team: Join a diverse, global team with experience across tech, ed-tech, and various industries;
We use digital tools like Miro, Notion, and Google Workspace for seamless collaboration;
Impactful Work: Your efforts directly influence the success rates of students finding jobs post-graduation.
At this time, we are unable to offer H-1B, L-1A/B sponsorship opportunities.
This job description is not designed to contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties, or responsibilities that are required. Nothing in this job description restricts management's right to assign or reassign duties and responsibilities at any time.


Ôªø


TripleTen is an equal employment opportunity/affirmative action employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, religion, disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, protected military/veteran status, or any other legally protected factor.

Title: Senior Data Analyst, Customer Segmentation - Markets (all genders)
Description:
THE ROLE & THE TEAM

You work for the Customer Analytics team in Zalando‚Äôs Markets organization, which enables data driven business strategies for 20+ countries. Through our customer focussed analytics and segmentations we put our customers at the center of every marketing and retail decision. As a (Senior) Customer Data Analyst in our Customer Segmentation Team you are the closest link to our customer You build a deep understanding of our customer base by developing and analyzing different customer segments based on their purchasing behavior, interests, customer value and onsite activities. You will transform data and segmentations into actionable insights and recommendations that drive strategic decisions and customer retention.


INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN


At Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy

https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategy

Our employee resource groups

https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groups


WHAT WE‚ÄôD LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)




Develop and analyze customer segmentations and audiences, support targeting and steering initiatives to drive customer value and retention. Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to optimize and productionalize your segmentations and audience selections.
Design, conduct and evaluate A/B tests to optimize your segmentations and audiences according to their use case. Recommend testing strategies to optimize targeted campaigns, campaign efficiency and ultimately customer value and retention. Translate complex questions into sound analytical tasks, autonomously planning large scale projects.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to identify new strategic opportunities and recommend actions supporting the customer strategy. Present your findings and work closely with business stakeholders and product owners to operationalize your recommendations.
Drive data mindset in the team and provide senior guidance to your team members in terms of methodology & technology to raise the bar within the department.Collaborate with other analysts, data scientists, engineers and commercial colleagues to untap new sources of data and know-how.




WE‚ÄôD LOVE TO MEET YOU IF YOU HAVE




5+ years experience in using customer data in smart and creative ways to answer business questions and/or drive targeting efforts incl. model driven statistical analysis, e.g. Causal Inference. Very good quantitative degree, e.g. in Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science.
Advanced skills in data methodologies and technologies (Python and SQL, PySpark). Visualization tools, e.g. MicroStrategy, Tableau, and versioning tools, e.g. Git/GitHub, are considered a plus. Curious about learning new technologies, e.g. Databricks, AWS data lake, Airflow.
Strong communicator to challenge the status-quo, tell data stories, maximize decision impact of your results and liaison with commercial and tech people alike.
Proactive, fast learner, problem solver, teamplayer, comfortable working in English in a fast paced international work environment



OUR OFFER



Zalando provides a range of benefits, here‚Äôs an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
Employee shares program
40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Lounge by Zalando, discounts from external partners
2 paid volunteering days a year
Hybrid working model with up to 60% remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
27 days of vacation a year to start for full-time employees
Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
Family services, including counseling and support
Health and wellbeing options (including Wellhub, formerly Gympass)
Mental health support and coaching available
Drive your development through our training platform and biannual peer-to-peer review

Title: Senior Data Analyst - Data Platforms (m/f/d)
Description:
We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Data Analyst to help us accomplish our mission to improve and extend lives by learning from the experience of every person with cancer. Are you ready to be the next changemaker in cancer care?

Flatiron Health is a healthtech company using data for good to power smarter care for every person with cancer, around the world. Flatiron partners with cancer centers in the US, Europe and Asia to transform patients‚Äô real-life experiences into real-world evidence and create a more modern, connected oncology ecosystem. Our multidisciplinary teams include oncologists, data scientists, software engineers, epidemiologists, product experts and more. Flatiron Health is an independent affiliate of the Roche Group.

What You'll Do

The Senior Data Analyst position is a position within our broader International Data Science organization. The Data Science team is a diverse and talented group of individuals with strong expertise in discovering and understanding customer needs, making data-driven decisions within an ambiguous problem space, and rapidly prototyping and iterating on data products.

Building on 10 years of experience in the US, Flatiron‚Äôs international team is scaling Flatiron‚Äôs approach in new countries. Streamlined teams in each market are establishing partnerships with local cancer providers, and developing high-quality real-world data for researchers around the world. Data Scientists and Data Analysts are embedded on those teams and their work touches every aspect of Flatiron‚Äôs international product and strategy. This position specifically will be embedded on one of our Data Platforms teams which is focussed on developing tooling for curating unstructured data.

Specifically, you‚Äôll:



Collaborate with cross-functional partners to track metrics and support decision-making for clinical data processing operations
Build dashboards for internal use cases; support users by conducting ad-hoc analyses and taking action on user feedback.
Conduct analyses to provide insight into user behavior for our internal tools to help inform product decisions.
Immerse yourself in business and technical context to help your team identify opportunities for optimizing our processes and unlocking new value from our unique datasets.



Who You Are

You're a kind, collaborative and analytic problem solver and value the opportunity to think beyond the way things are. In addition,



You have 3+ years of industry experience in relevant roles or have completed a PhD in a relevant field.
You‚Äôre impact-oriented, and care deeply about creating real change for customers, users, and ultimately patients. You choose the right, rather than the flashiest, method available to reach your goals.
You have a strong background in analytics and can fit the appropriate analysis approach to complex business or research problems.
You are a clear and confident communicator who can explain technical concepts to business and clinical partners.
You are versatile and can easily pick up new programming languages and tools, but come with strong experience in Python.
You have a record of success driving initiatives forward by generating buy-in, managing complexity, and continuously delivering business impact.
You are proficient in English.



Optional



You have experience working with healthcare-related data.



Who We Are

Our people are at the center of everything we do. We strive to foster a culture where our teammates feel equipped and empowered to make meaningful contributions with confidence, compassion, and clarity. Visit the Life at Flatiron page to learn more.
Show more

Title: Junior Database Engineer Intern
Description:
Company Overview

Join our team as a Junior Database Engineer Intern and gain hands-on experience with modern database design, PostgreSQL administration, and enterprise data synchronization. This internship offers an excellent opportunity to learn professional database management while working on a real-world recruitment platform integration.

Position Summary

As a Junior Database Engineer Intern, you will assist in maintaining and improving our Manatal database synchronization system. You'll work closely with senior engineers to learn best practices in database design, performance optimization, and professional documentation.

Learning Opportunities & Responsibilities


Assist in monitoring database performance and creating performance reports
Learn PostgreSQL database administration and optimization techniques
Help document database schemas and relationships using professional ERD tools
Support data validation and quality assurance processes
Participate in troubleshooting data inconsistencies
Assist in writing SQL queries for reporting and analysis
Learn Docker basics and container management
Contribute to technical documentation and data dictionaries
Explore modern database platforms like Supabase
Participate in database design reviews and team meetings



Required Basic Skills


Educational Background:
Currently pursuing or recently completed degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field
Strong academic performance in database or data structures courses

Technical Foundation:
Understanding of relational database concepts and SQL basics
Familiarity with at least one programming language (Python, JavaScript, or similar)
Basic understanding of data structures and algorithms
Comfortable with command-line interfaces
Strong analytical mindset

Soft Skills:
Excellent attention to detail
Strong problem-solving abilities
Good written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work independently and in a team
Eagerness to learn new technologies



Good to Have Skills


Previous internship or project experience with databases
Familiarity with PostgreSQL or other SQL databases
Experience with any ERD or database design tools
Basic knowledge of Docker or containerization
Understanding of JSON data format
Exposure to Linux/Unix environments
GitHub experience for version control
Familiarity with modern database platforms (Supabase, PlanetScale, etc.)
Basic understanding of API concepts



What You'll Learn


Enterprise-level database design and optimization
Professional ERD tools and documentation standards
PostgreSQL advanced features and performance tuning
Modern database platforms and cloud services
Docker and containerization for databases
Real-world data synchronization challenges
Professional development practices



Internship Details


Duration: 6 months (with possibility of extension or full-time conversion)
Flexible hours (minimum 20 hours/week)
Remote work available
Mentorship from senior database engineers
Hands-on experience with production systems
Certificate of completion and recommendation letter for successful interns

Title: Staff Product Analyst, Platform
Description:
We are looking for an experienced Staff Product Analyst to join our Tools & Workflow vertical in the Platform product team and help us scale and improve our products across 50+ countries!

About Us

Bolt is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe and Africa, with over 200 million customers in 50+ countries. We‚Äôre a global team of more than 100 nationalities joined on a common mission ‚Äì to make cities for people, not cars. And we need you to make it happen!

About The Role

Platform team operates across all Bolt verticals, supporting business growth and success. The team tackles problems including geospatial (routing, ETAs etc), user identity and verification, user communications, internal tools, automation, customer support and internal experimentation.

As a Staff Product Analyst at Bolt, you are much more than a data cruncher. You are co-leading the development of the product and will drive the product strategy with other analysts in Tools & Workflow. The teams in this area own the complete support experience for Bolt users and build tools and technology for efficient workforce management. You will be at the forefront of evaluating how Automation and Artificial intelligence can bring value to the support experience and lead discovery to find product opportunities with an optimum balance between cost-effective and quality support.

Your daily adventures will include:


Driving data mindset in the team, mentoring team members and being a quality gatekeeper on data leading to product decisions
Holding accountability for measuring product success for the whole space, designing relevant and actionable metrics and owning A/B testing best practices to make better and faster product decisions
Closely collaborating with your partners in Product Management, Engineering, Data Science, and other functions to drive forward cross-functional product and analytics initiatives and ensure seamless execution
Development of the in-depth analytical understanding of what drives the growth of products and leadership over the discovery of new opportunities to inform and steer the product strategy



About you:


You hold a university degree in Economics, Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Management or similar studies
You have 5+ years of experience working in Product Analytics and/or Data Science
You rank your SQL skills as ‚Äúoutstanding‚Äù & Python/R skills as ‚Äúprofound‚Äù, and you have experience with BI tools and data visualisation
You have strong business acumen, an entrepreneurial mindset and possess outstanding communication and leadership skills, with the ability to decompose complex solutions and insights into a clear narrative
You have an advanced understanding of end-to-end A/B testing, including some knowledge of concepts such as time-based testing or other causal inference methods
You have experience in designing, building, and managing complex data models and handling large unstructured and semi-structured data



Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you don‚Äôt tick every box, please consider applying if you feel you‚Äôre the kind of person described above!

Why you‚Äôll love it here:


Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50+ countries.
Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode.
Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
Some perks may differ depending on your location.

Title: Product Analyst
Description:
Are you a data detective who loves turning numbers into narratives and insights into action? Do you get a thrill from uncovering the "why" behind business trends and using that knowledge to shape strategy?




We are looking for a sharp and driven Product Analyst to empower our teams with data-driven intelligence working at our HQ in Dubai, UAE.. In this role, you will be the cornerstone of decision-making, providing the analytical firepower that guides our product roadmap and business strategy. You'll go beyond reporting‚Äîyou'll be a strategic partner, using data to identify opportunities, mitigate risks, and tell the story of where we should go next.




If you have a consultant's problem-solving skills and a passion for the product lifecycle, this is your opportunity to make a tangible impact.




What You'll Do:

Analyze complex datasets, core metrics, and business drivers to generate actionable insights that answer our most pressing questions.
Develop and maintain intuitive dashboards, reports, and analytical frameworks that empower teams across the company to make smarter, faster decisions.
Partner directly with Product Managers and business leaders to identify growth opportunities, potential risks, and areas for optimization.
Provide research and analysis on market trends and leverage AI-driven analytical techniques to keep us at the forefront of innovation.




Who You Are (Qualifications):

You have experience in a highly analytical role (e.g., Business Analyst, Data Analyst, Strategy Analyst) within a consulting firm, tech company, or product-led organization.
You possess a strong quantitative background and are proficient in SQL, Python, R, or other data analysis tools. Experience with data visualization platforms (e.g., Tableau, Looker, Power BI) is essential.
You are a structured problem-solver who breaks down complex, ambiguous problems into actionable steps‚Äîconsulting experience is a major plus.
You take ownership of your work from start to finish, demonstrating accountability for your insights and their impact.
You have an enterprise mindset: you're resilient, proactive, and have the drive to "find a way" to get to the answer.




Ideal Backgrounds Include:

Former analysts from top-tier consulting firms with exposure to tech, data, or AI projects.
Analysts from product-first organizations (e.g., tech-enabled consumer companies, SaaS businesses) who are skilled at partnering with product teams.




Why Join Us?

Strategic Influence: Your analysis will directly inform key product and business decisions, giving you a front-row seat to our strategy.
Skill Growth: Hone your technical skills while developing deep business acumen and strategic thinking in a high-impact environment.
Collaborative Culture: Join a team that values curiosity, intellectual rigor, and data-driven debate.




About Us-




Landmark Group




Our journey started in 1973 with a single store in Bahrain. Since then, we have grown into a global retail and hospitality group. The proud creator of 25 plus value led, own-built brands across retail, hospitality, food, and leisure.




Over the years, our UAE - based group has evolved into a comprehensive retail and hospitality entity, with over 2200 retail stores, leisure, and hospitality outlets, panning the GCC, Middle East, India, Southeast Asia, and Africa. Today, Landmark Group is one of GCC's largest omnichannel retailers and India's top home and fashion retailer.




We take immense pride in the organic growth of our retail brands, which have blossomed into household names. From Max, Splash, Babyshop, Centrepoint, Shoemart, Home Centre, Emax, Fitness First, to Fun City, to name a few, our brands span across a multitude of categories, enriching the lives of countless families over the past decade.




As a part of the Landmark Group, a renowned retail and hospitality conglomerate in the Middle East, North Africa, and India, Landmark Digital is the dynamic digital arm of Landmark Retail, serving as the cornerstone of our omnichannel business strategy.




Headquartered in Dubai, UAE, we oversee the digital operations of eight leading brands across diverse geographies, with ambitious plans for expansion into new territories and functions. Joining us means becoming a vital part of the Middle East's most significant bricks-to-clicks success story, boasting an impressive year-on-year growth rate exceeding 100%.




Comprising a talented workforce of over 700 professionals across diverse domains, Landmark Digital spearheads various functions including Enterprise and E-commerce Tech, Product Management, User Design, and MarTech, among others. With our futuristic outlook, we are committed to delivering seamless digital experiences to our customers.




Landmark Digital




At Landmark Digital, we cultivate an agile work culture, empowering you to make impactful decisions from day one within collaborative squads comprising professionals from over 20 nationalities. Additionally, our dedicated software development center in Bangalore, India, offers opportunities for incubation, design, and optimization of digital products.




Working at Landmark Digital means engaging with cutting-edge technologies, including Enterprise and E-commerce tech, headless commerce, Java Spring Boot, React Native, React frontend, and Azure Cloud solutions, providing an enriching environment for professional growth and development.




In addition to competitive remuneration and benefits, we prioritize continuous learning and growth through dedicated training and upskilling initiatives. Furthermore, our vibrant workplace culture fosters camaraderie through various team events, celebrations, and recreational amenities, ensuring a fulfilling experience both personally and professionally.




Come be a part of Landmark Digital, where innovation, collaboration, and growth converge to redefine the digital retail landscape

Show more

Title: Visiting Founders Associate - Excel Power User & Capital Markets
Description:
We (Jan, Fernando) are building kontext21 an AI startup focused on harnessing professionals work context.




Our first product is X21 an Excel AI add-in focus on financial modelling for PE, M&A and investment banks.




We are backed by some great Investors: Antler, VR Ventures and Angels.


Tasks



Work directly with the founders on validating our first product for Excel power users


Build and test AI-powered features that supercharge Excel ‚Äî turning spreadsheets into intelligent assistants


Become the ‚Äúvoice of the spreadsheet user‚Äù in product and design conversations


Research real-world use cases and help shape product features from the ground up


Be part of early outreach: talk to users, design experiments, analyze workflows


Launch your own side-project or automation, codenamed ‚ÄúExcel‚Äù, powered by our SDK ‚Äî a ‚Äústartup within‚Äù


Bonus: use your Excel skills to hack internal ops, tracking, and dashboards



Requirements



You have used Excel for 20+ hours per week ‚Äî professionally or obsessively


You can build and debug complex formulas or have built complex financial models or other analytical models before


Bonus: experience with Power Query, VBA, or Google Sheets scripting


Passion for tech startups and excitement to be at the earliest stage


Sharp analytical thinking and a relentless drive to make things better


You love to ship, test, learn, and iterate ‚Äî not sit on ideas





Why you shouldn't join:





You are not comfortable working without a clear structure.


You have >3 years of experience and look for that to be reflected in the pay. Our budget can not support that.


You are not ready for a career opportunity with risks. Despite our growth, we are still an early-stage startup. If you need something more predictable, this is not the right fit.



Benefits



Flexible working hours


Sport membership


Learn from us. Check out our profiles, we are experienced founders and happy to teach.





Come as you are, let's build together.

Title: IIoT Business Data Analyst (f/m/d)
Description:
You want to redefine how entire industries work by leveraging IoT, Smart Manufacturing and Industry 4.0?

Would you like to be part of the success of a digital solution which will revolutionize the manufacturing process to improve shop floor performance? If your answer is a big yes, you should continue reading!

With HQ in Berlin, FactoryPal is a corporate Start-Up ‚Äì with an additional location in Porto/Portugal. The venture is poised to become the leading end-to-end IoT solution for machine efficiency and equipment effectiveness. The digitally enabled solution is not just completely reshaping how companies produce and elevate their efficiency levels, but it is fundamentally augmenting the way manufacturing employees do their job.

We are data scientists, engineers, designers, IIoT experts, product managers, and manufacturing operations consultants. We are a team, united by our shared ambition: revolutionize manufacturing and transform the way it is done to ensure smooth operations.

Become part of an amazing journey and successfully accompany our customers in their Digital Factory efforts!

Your Role & Key Responsibilities as a IIoT & Business Data Analyst

Data Transformation And Analysis

Joining our customer value analytics team as a data analyst means you'll be an essential part of further developing FactoryPal's analytics product as well as supporting value creation within our customer projects. Together with our experienced data analysts, you'll work on the following topics:


Generate key insights into customer data by extracting, cleaning, and transforming data from our Snowflake data warehouse using dbt.
Create and maintain data pipelines to ensure accurate and timely data delivery.
Explore large datasets to identify patterns, trends, and anomalies to tell stories with data.


Business Intelligence (BI) Reporting


Work with Tableau to create insightful reports and interactive dashboards to be embedded in the FactoryPal application.
Visualize complex data in a user-friendly manner, enabling stakeholders to make informed decisions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand reporting requirements and deliver actionable insights.


Stakeholder Management & Product Development


Understand and identify the analysis and reporting needs of key customer contacts and internal stakeholders
Derive and communicate insights into customers‚Äô machine and business data.
Contribute with your experience to our product development process and thereby enhance FactoryPal‚Äôs analytics solution.


Your Experience & Skills


Master‚Äôs degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Data Science, Industrial Engineering, STEM or related fields)
5+ years of experience in data analysis, modeling and reporting in a relevant environment - ideally in the industrial / manufacturing sector
Strong analytical mindset and a passion for working with data
Proficiency in SQL and relational databases
Profound experience in data modeling ideally with dbt
Experience with Business Intelligence Tools (ideally Tableau)
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git)
Solid knowledge of Python for data analytics
Experience maintaining and troubleshooting Airflow DAGs is a plus
Ideally first experience in development of an analytics product using agile methods
Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively within our team
Willingness to take ownership of tasks and seek solutions independently
Your English is fluent


What You Get

HTML:
You want to redefine how entire industries work by leveraging IoT, Smart Manufacturing and Industry 4.0?

Would you like to be part of the success of a digital solution which will revolutionize the manufacturing process to improve shop floor performance? If your answer is a big yes, you should continue reading!

With HQ in Berlin, FactoryPal is a corporate Start-Up ‚Äì with an additional location in Porto/Portugal. The venture is poised to become the leading end-to-end IoT solution for machine efficiency and equipment effectiveness. The digitally enabled solution is not just completely reshaping how companies produce and elevate their efficiency levels, but it is fundamentally augmenting the way manufacturing employees do their job.

We are data scientists, engineers, designers, IIoT experts, product managers, and manufacturing operations consultants. We are a team, united by our shared ambition: revolutionize manufacturing and transform the way it is done to ensure smooth operations.

Become part of an amazing journey and successfully accompany our customers in their Digital Factory efforts!

Your Role & Key Responsibilities as a IIoT & Business Data Analyst

Data Transformation And Analysis

Joining our customer value analytics team as a data analyst means you'll be an essential part of further developing FactoryPal's analytics product as well as supporting value creation within our customer projects. Together with our experienced data analysts, you'll work on the following topics:

  • Generate key insights into customer data by extracting, cleaning, and transforming data from our Snowflake data warehouse using dbt.
  • Create and maintain data pipelines to ensure accurate and timely data delivery.
  • Explore large datasets to identify patterns, trends, and anomalies to tell stories with data.

Business Intelligence (BI) Reporting

  • Work with Tableau to create insightful reports and interactive dashboards to be embedded in the FactoryPal application.
  • Visualize complex data in a user-friendly manner, enabling stakeholders to make informed decisions.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand reporting requirements and deliver actionable insights.

Stakeholder Management & Product Development

  • Understand and identify the analysis and reporting needs of key customer contacts and internal stakeholders
  • Derive and communicate insights into customers‚Äô machine and business data.
  • Contribute with your experience to our product development process and thereby enhance FactoryPal‚Äôs analytics solution.

Your Experience & Skills

  • Master‚Äôs degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Data Science, Industrial Engineering, STEM or related fields)
  • 5+ years of experience in data analysis, modeling and reporting in a relevant environment - ideally in the industrial / manufacturing sector
  • Strong analytical mindset and a passion for working with data
  • Proficiency in SQL and relational databases
  • Profound experience in data modeling ideally with dbt
  • Experience with Business Intelligence Tools (ideally Tableau)
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git)
  • Solid knowledge of Python for data analytics
  • Experience maintaining and troubleshooting Airflow DAGs is a plus
  • Ideally first experience in development of an analytics product using agile methods
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively within our team
  • Willingness to take ownership of tasks and seek solutions independently
  • Your English is fluent

What You Get

  • Opportunity to work in a well-funded corporate Start-Up with a competitive advantage derived from market access.
  • Exposure to the hottest IT technologies, like AI/ML, Cloud and Industrial IoT
  • Challenging role with lots of opportunities to grow fast & steadily - as an expert and as an entrepreneur
  • Development opportunity in a group of professionals, who joined from top tier start-up, industry and consulting companies and an education from top tier universities
  • Our amazing Berlin office in the AI Campus with access to Berlin‚Äôs AI ecosystem
  • An agile, inspiring, multi-cultural, multi-disciplinary and innovative work environment with great colleagues
  • A competitive salary & benefits package and dedicated training budget

Are you interested?

Join our team and send us your detailed application documents via the "Apply" button.

Title: Junior Data Center Technician (m/w/d)
Description:
The Junior Data Center Technician is responsible for monitoring and managing the technical installations and infrastructure in EMEA data centers. This includes ensuring the optimal operation of critical systems such as air-conditioning, UPS, generators, and environmental controls. The Junior Data Center Technician serves as the main contact during shifts for Security, Management, Engineers, and Customers, ensuring smooth operations, quick issue resolution, and effective communication.

Qualifications


Languages: Fluent in German (preferred) and English.
Skills: Technical affinity or Helpdesk/Warehousing/Customer facing experience preferred, proficiency in Microsoft Office, strong organizational and administrative abilities. Work Environment:
Operates Monday to Friday day shift.


Key Responsibilities


Monitoring: Continuously monitor technical and environmental systems, respond to tickets and alarms, manage notifications, and escalate issues as needed.
Issue Management: Track and document issues in the ticketing system, and compile weekly/monthly reports.
Shift Management: Ensure smooth shift transitions through thorough handovers and regular updates to the NOC Manager.
Incident Reporting: Accurately report incidents and collaborate with team members for coordinated responses.
Support Desk Tasks: Take on support desk responsibilities outside of office hours, ensuring critical tasks are addressed promptly and end users are informed of any relevant actions or updates.
General Maintenance Oversight: Monitor and support general maintenance activities, ensuring that all work is completed as scheduled and that relevant stakeholders, including end users, are informed of progress and completion.
Competitive salary
Pension
Paid time off and holiday pay
Professional growth opportunities
Show more

Title: Data & AI Consultant (m/f/d)
Description:
Brief description

Dataciders, a dynamically growing group of companies in the upper midmarket, is a leading service provider in the IT service environment with a focus on data and AI in German-speaking countries. Our success is confirmed by our 1st place in the renowned L√ºnendonk list for data & analytics services.

We are characterized by our flexibility and enthusiasm for technological trends and innovations. We live change and shape the future.

At ixto, you will work in an interdisciplinary team from IT, economics, data science and other exciting disciplines - united by a passion for turning ideas into real solutions. You will not only be given room for your expertise, but also the freedom to actively shape our projects, processes and culture. Innovation is not a department for us - it is our everyday life.

What you can expect in your new job


Projects in state-of-the-art data & AI technologies
Challenges along the entire data value chain: from the cloud platform to the data loading route to the BI report and ML model
Varied activities between customer workshops and coding sessions
Exciting customers in the DACH region from a wide range of industries


Your profile


You have a high ability to learn and enthusiasm for current developments in the field of data & AI
You are self-confident and customer-oriented - both in workshops and in long-term customer projects
You have experience with current AI/ML technologies such as OpenAI's GPT models, Microsoft Azure AI Foundry or Databricks Mosaic AI
You have experience in current data technologies such as Microsoft Fabric or Databricks
You are proficient in Python; we would like to see knowledge of other programming languages (e.g. Java, C#, TypeScript)
Ideally, you have experience with cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure, AWS and GCP
You are characterized by strong communication skills, ability to work in a team and willingness to travel
You are proficient in German (C1) and English (C1)


What we offer you

We are a leading provider of customized data solutions that form the basis for important decisions for our customers. Join us in designing projects that work!


A well-coordinated team of inquisitive talents and experienced consultants
A working environment that promotes personal responsibility, trust and real participation
Personal development with learning time budgets and knowledge transfer within the team
Regular team and sports events - from online lunches to annual retreats
Projects with real added value: our solutions create transparency and decision-making security for our customers
flexible working hours
Further training
modern hardware
Extensive sports & wellness flat rate via leading company fitness providers
Support for your mental fitness via OpenUp, a strong offer for mental health and resilience promotion
Fruit and drinks in the office


We are looking forward to your application!

Have we piqued your interest? Then apply now!

Take your chance and send your complete application with CV, cover letter and references, stating your salary expectations and availability, as a PDF document.

You are also welcome to send an e-mail to: jobs@dataciders.com

Title: Senior Data Analyst, Customer Segmentation - Markets (all genders)
Description:
THE ROLE & THE TEAM

You work for the Customer Analytics team in Zalando‚Äôs Markets organization, which enables data driven business strategies for 20+ countries. Through our customer focussed analytics and segmentations we put our customers at the center of every marketing and retail decision. As a (Senior) Customer Data Analyst in our Customer Segmentation Team you are the closest link to our customer You build a deep understanding of our customer base by developing and analyzing different customer segments based on their purchasing behavior, interests, customer value and onsite activities. You will transform data and segmentations into actionable insights and recommendations that drive strategic decisions and customer retention.


INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN


At Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy

https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategy

Our employee resource groups

https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groups


WHAT WE‚ÄôD LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)




Develop and analyze customer segmentations and audiences, support targeting and steering initiatives to drive customer value and retention. Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to optimize and productionalize your segmentations and audience selections.
Design, conduct and evaluate A/B tests to optimize your segmentations and audiences according to their use case. Recommend testing strategies to optimize targeted campaigns, campaign efficiency and ultimately customer value and retention. Translate complex questions into sound analytical tasks, autonomously planning large scale projects.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to identify new strategic opportunities and recommend actions supporting the customer strategy. Present your findings and work closely with business stakeholders and product owners to operationalize your recommendations.
Drive data mindset in the team and provide senior guidance to your team members in terms of methodology & technology to raise the bar within the department.Collaborate with other analysts, data scientists, engineers and commercial colleagues to untap new sources of data and know-how.




WE‚ÄôD LOVE TO MEET YOU IF YOU HAVE




5+ years experience in using customer data in smart and creative ways to answer business questions and/or drive targeting efforts incl. model driven statistical analysis, e.g. Causal Inference. Very good quantitative degree, e.g. in Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science.
Advanced skills in data methodologies and technologies (Python and SQL, PySpark). Visualization tools, e.g. MicroStrategy, Tableau, and versioning tools, e.g. Git/GitHub, are considered a plus. Curious about learning new technologies, e.g. Databricks, AWS data lake, Airflow.
Strong communicator to challenge the status-quo, tell data stories, maximize decision impact of your results and liaison with commercial and tech people alike.
Proactive, fast learner, problem solver, teamplayer, comfortable working in English in a fast paced international work environment



OUR OFFER



Zalando provides a range of benefits, here‚Äôs an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
Employee shares program
40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Lounge by Zalando, discounts from external partners
2 paid volunteering days a year
Hybrid working model with up to 60% remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
27 days of vacation a year to start for full-time employees
Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
Family services, including counseling and support
Health and wellbeing options (including Wellhub, formerly Gympass)
Mental health support and coaching available
Drive your development through our training platform and biannual peer-to-peer review
Show more

Title: CEO Associate
Description:
Unsere Mission




Bei Checkturio bauen wir den europ√§ischen Marktf√ºhrer f√ºr die Digitalisierung von Fahrzeugpr√ºfungen und Wartungsmanagement auf. Unsere B2B-SaaS-Plattform unterst√ºtzt Logistik- und Transportunternehmen dabei, kritische Betriebsprozesse zu digitalisieren ‚Äì Ausfallzeiten zu reduzieren, Compliance zu verbessern und die Sicherheit von Fahrzeugflotten zu erh√∂hen.




Wir sind ein Early-Stage-Startup mit Sitz in Berlin, haben ein marktreifes Produkt, zahlende Kunden und strategische Investoren im R√ºcken. Jetzt treten wir in eine spannende Wachstumsphase ein ‚Äì und suchen eine engagierte Pers√∂nlichkeit, die uns beim Skalieren unterst√ºtzt.


Deine Rolle




Als CEO Associate arbeitest du direkt mit unserem CEO zusammen, um Wachstum zu beschleunigen und neue Gesch√§ftsm√∂glichkeiten zu schaffen.

Dein Schwerpunkt liegt auf der Umsetzung von Marketing-Initiativen, die Inbound-Anfragen generieren, sowie auf der Unterst√ºtzung gezielter Outbound-Aktivit√§ten, dem direkten Austausch mit Kunden und der Koordination von Pilotprojekten.

Diese Position bietet wertvolle Vertriebserfahrung und direkten Kundenkontakt ‚Äì du erh√§ltst Einblicke in den Markt aus erster Hand und die M√∂glichkeit, aktiv daran mitzuwirken, wie wir Interessenten gewinnen, √ºberzeugen und langfristig binden.

Dar√ºber hinaus spielst du eine wichtige Rolle im Fundraising und in der Investor Relations, indem du Materialien erstellst, KPIs trackst und den Kontakt zu Stakeholdern pflegst.




Deine Hauptaufgaben




1. Marketing & Inbound Sales Development

Entwicklung und Umsetzung von Marketinginitiativen zur Gewinnung und Ansprache potenzieller Kunden (z. B. LinkedIn-Kampagnen, Case Studies, Newsletter, PR).
Ausbau des Produktmarketings √ºber alle relevanten Kan√§le mit Fokus auf messbare Lead-Generierung.
Zusammenarbeit mit dem CEO und dem Team zur Themenfindung und Erstellung von Content, der Inbound-Interesse weckt.
Verwaltung von eingehenden Leads inkl. Erfassung, Qualifizierung und Follow-up.
√úberwachung und Optimierung von Kampagnen zur Steigerung der Conversion Rate von Marketingkan√§len in Pilotprojekte.




2. Growth Hacking & Experimentation

Testen innovativer Taktiken zur Reichweiten- und Engagementsteigerung in Zielm√§rkten.
Experimentieren mit verschiedenen Kan√§len, Formaten und Botschaften zur Optimierung der Lead-Generierung.
Nutzung von Automatisierungstools (HubSpot, LinkedIn, Apollo, Clay etc.) zur Effizienzsteigerung.




3. Vertriebserfahrung & Kundenkontakt

Teilnahme an Gespr√§chen, Demos und Veranstaltungen mit potenziellen Kunden, um deren Bed√ºrfnisse zu verstehen.
Unterst√ºtzung bei der Lead-Qualifizierung und Pilotkoordination.
Aufbau und Pflege von Beziehungen zu Interessenten und Branchenkontakten.




4. Sales Operations & Reporting

Sicherstellen einer gepflegten und nutzbaren CRM-Datenbasis (HubSpot).
Tracking und Reporting von Lead-Generierung und Kampagnenperformance √ºber BI-Tools (Looker).
Analyse von Conversion-Daten zur Identifizierung kurzfristiger Chancen und langfristiger Verbesserungen.




5. Fundraising & Investor Relations

Unterst√ºtzung des CEOs bei der Erstellung von Pitch-Decks, Finanzberichten und KPI-Dashboards.
Koordination von Investoren-Updates und Pflege der Stakeholder-Beziehungen.
Mitwirkung an Due-Diligence-Prozessen und der Organisation von Fundraising-Aktivit√§ten.




6. Strategische CEO-Unterst√ºtzung

Mitarbeit an wichtigen kommerziellen und operativen Projekten.
Strukturierung und Optimierung interner Prozesse zur Unterst√ºtzung des Unternehmenswachstums.




Dein Profil




Deutsch als Muttersprache, flie√üend in Englisch.
1‚Äì4 Jahre Berufserfahrung im Marketing, Business Development, Consulting oder in einem anderen dynamischen Umfeld.
W√ºnschenswert: Erfahrung im B2B-SaaS-Bereich oder in der Logistik-/Transportbranche.
Ausgepr√§gte schriftliche und m√ºndliche Kommunikationsf√§higkeiten sowie Talent f√ºr die Erstellung √ºberzeugender Inhalte.
Sicher im Kundenkontakt und in der Lage, den Mehrwert klar zu vermitteln.
Sehr gute organisatorische F√§higkeiten und die F√§higkeit, mehrere Projekte parallel zu managen.
Erfahrung mit digitalen Marketing-Tools (LinkedIn Campaign Manager, HubSpot, Google Analytics) von Vorteil.
Datengetriebene Denkweise und Interesse an Produkt- und Technologiethemen.
Hands-on-Mentalit√§t, pragmatisch und motiviert, in eine F√ºhrungsrolle hineinzuwachsen.
Wohnhaft in Berlin (oder bereit umzuziehen) ‚Äì vor Ort, Vollzeit.




Was wir bieten




Direkten Zugang zum CEO, zu Vertriebsprozessen und zum Marktgeschehen.
Die M√∂glichkeit, deine Rolle aktiv mitzugestalten und in einem schnell wachsenden Startup Verantwortung zu √ºbernehmen.
Eigenverantwortung f√ºr Marketing-, Inbound- und kundenorientierte Projekte ab Tag eins.
B√ºro im Herzen von Berlin (Mitte) mit viel Gestaltungsspielraum.
Wettbewerbsf√§higes Gehalt (Fixum + leistungsabh√§ngiger Bonus).
Unterst√ºtzung durch erfahrene strategische Investoren und einen klaren Wachstumsplan.
